title: font & technology
content:
Hi,  
I’m looking for books, links or anything else about the relationship between font and the technology used to design type… How font technology influenced font…  
Can you help me??
author: notjoe

comments.content: [Counterpunch : Making Type in the 16th Century, Designing Typefaces Now, by Fred Smeijers](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526013013/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/0907259065/sr=8-1/qid=1143473401/ref=pd_bbs_1/103-7615361-6465407?%5Fencoding=UTF8)

\>I’m looking for books, links or anything else about the relationship between font and the technology used to design type

Every serious book or website that deals with type design can’t help but talk about the relationship between type design and the technology used in both the design of the type and the rendering of the text set in it. So your question is very open-ended and therefore difficult (or easy) to answer. Posting it 4 times won’t help :-(

Cheers, Si

“Posting it 4 times won’t help :-( “.  
Yes, but that weird error message might causing him to try several times. I had to open a new browser tab to make sure this posted. (I’m editing this post now.)

Having said that, take a look at the [Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526013013/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Books) in the Typowiki.
